name: Hangry Hippo
description:
Beat the hunger - or should we say HANGER - by eating all the fruits!

Hangry Hippo covers four unique game modes including wildly popular shooting mode.
Brag with your scores and share the fun on facebook!

Arcade:
Eat as much as you can but beware the falling leaves!

Time Challenge:
In this mode time is limited. You can, however, stop the time by eating stopwatches or by using Freeze Time -button which becomes available after you reach certain amount of streak.

I Ate Too Much:
You literally ate too much and you feel sick. It's now time to burb out all the fruits you have eaten and shoot the falling leaves.

I Hate Bananas:
For some unexplainable reason you suddenly hate bananas. God knows why. Your challenge is to avoid all the bananas which are falling down in masses!

Like on Facebook:

https://www.facebook.com/hangryhippo
